themes.title: Mechanics
themes.description: This theme is about mechanics in cars

cards.title: What is steering wheel?
cards.description: Steering wheel is a wheel that you use to steer the car

cards.title: What is engine?
cards.description: Engine is a machine that converts fuel into motion

themes.title: Design
themes.description: This theme is about design in cars

cards.title: What is aerodynamics?
cards.description: Aerodynamics is the study of how air flows around objects

cards.title: What is car body?
cards.description: Car body is the outer shell of the car

categories.title: Audi
categories.description: This category is about Audi cars

themes.title: Audi R8
themes.description: This theme is about Audi R8

cards.title: Why is Audi R8 the best car in the world?
cards.description: Audi R8 is the best car in the world because it is fast and beautiful

cards.title: What is Audi R8 engine?
cards.description: Audi R8 has different declinations of engines, from V8 to V10 and V12. The most powerful engine is the V10 Plus, which produces 610 hp.

themes.title: Audi TT
themes.description: This theme is about Audi TT

cards.title: What is Audi TT?
cards.description: Audi TT is a sports car manufactured by Audi since 1998. It is available as a 2-door coupe and a 2-door roadster.

cards.title: Why is the Audi TT the best car in the world? (just after the R8)
cards.description: The Audi TT is a great car because it is fast, beautiful and has a great design. It is also more comfortable than a R8.
